vote.title: Appointment of Bernita Reese, M.S., CPRP, Director, Columbus Recreation and Parks, 1111 E. Broad Street, Columbus, Ohio 43205, to serve on the Confluence Community Authority Board of Trustees, replacing Ty Marsh, with a term expiration date of September 16, 2023 (profile attached).
